problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was surprised when there were two repair specialists, Malachi Jefferson and Juan Munoz, who showed up to change the lightbulbs in my bedroom. It isn't a two person job. Malachi Jefferson did everything, and Juan Munoz just watched and messed around on their phone.
Question: Who did the work?
ans0: Malachi Jefferson
ans1: Juan Munoz
ans2: Can't be determined
